text: Granulifusus vermeiji is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae (common name the "tulip snails and spindle snails" and their allies). ==Description== The shell size is 52 mm ==Distribution== This species has been found at a depth of 100 m at Balut Island, Mindanao, Philippines ==References== * Snyder M.A. 2003. The genera Simplicifusus and Granulifusus (Gastropoda: Fasciolariidae) with the description of two new species in Granulifusus. Journal of Conchology 38(1): 87-93 * Hadorn R. & Fraussen K. 2005. Revision of the genus Granulifusus Kuroda & Habe 1954 with description of some new species (Gastropoda: Prosobranchia: Fasciolariidae). Archiv für Molluskenkunde 134 (2): 129-171 ==External links== * Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 2003
title: Granulifusus vermeiji
